description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Peterhead vs Bonnyrigg Rose in the Scottish League Two
title: Peterhead vs Bonnyrigg Rose: Scottish League Two stats & head-to-head
title_page: Peterhead vs Bonnyrigg Rose: Scottish League Two stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Goal!
Goal! Peterhead 5, Bonnyrigg Rose 0. Adam Carnwath (Peterhead) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Cieran Dunne.
Post
Fourth official has announced 2 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Peter Pawlett (Peterhead) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high following a corner.
